"That was a really tasty lunch! Cabbage: "Caviar bento, actually."
"It's a pretty weird lunch to give out to people helping with the school's reconstruction, though."
"That's weird. I could've sworn I picked standard catering for our lunch order..."
"Well thanks, Kohri! I'm really happy that I got to eat such a delicious lunch!"
"Awww, you're just too precious, Aru! That settles it, I'll keep being careless with our lunch orders from now on!"
"Please don't. Really, who would even order a caviar lunch? The only person that comes to mind is that creepy president."
"You called?"
"Turn around and walk away."
"Scathing as ever, aren't you?!"
"You criticized me for only providing financial support, so I went out of my way to send you some lunch!"
"Hm? Oh no... the reason Kohri's lunch order got changed was..."
"As you can see, I have nothing to hide! You don't have to thank me."
"So it WAS you!"
"But, that lunch tasted so good!"
"You flatter me so!"
"Oh yes, I have a newly-made app that I wanted you all to try out today."
"My company's been developing a photography app that captures your target's wildest fantasies and makes them visible! The monitor of [Realization]..."
"Yeah, sure! I'll try it!"
"Kohri, you are such a pushover!"
"I wanna try too!"
"No, bad Aru! It's marketed towards creeps!"
"I see you've been expanding on your insults!"
"W-With this, if I take Hitsugi's photo... Hitsugi's wildest fantasies will...!"
"No, stop... Kohri, stay back...!"
"Ehehe... Your wildest fantasies are all mine, Hitsugi! Er, huh?"
"Kohri, I think you have it on selfie mode. What'll you do if you just took a picture of your own wildest fantasies?"
"G-Give me that, Kohri! Aru, this isn't something you should see."
"I see. I expected nothing less of my app. Kohri's wildest fantasy has been successfully photographed."
"Behold! All three of you are intimately--"
"You are unbelievable! You really think you'll be able to release an app like this?! Shut the project down, right this instant!"
"Hey, what was on the photo?"
"Y-You might be a little too young to see it, Aru. I should... probably make sure that doesn't end up getting leaked anywhere."
"Seems like everyone's having fun. A lot has happened, but I'm glad we were able to return to the good times we used to have."
"Yeah. The reconstruction's coming along well, and soon enough everything'll be back to normal. Peace is nice, isn't it?"

"Yeah! And it's all thanks to
<%me> and everyone else!"
"We all helped achieve this peace. Aru not least of all, right?"
